name: Trial By Rewind
description:
This is a very simple text based story driven game. This is my first ever making any game, so I tried to keep everything as simple as possible.

Controls - WASD or arrow keys to move, and left mouse button to click.  

Sound used - POL-windy-cavern https://www.playonloop.com/sound-effects-for-videos/ambience-indoor-sounds/

Art used - Designed by stockgiu / Freepik
